infos.value: Ahh, King Robb. My thanks. Yer fought hard.
Enough with the pleasantries.
Tell me, why did you slaughter Naiah?
Do yer think I'd kill her without reason?
You had a reason, I'm sure. Alas, I've heard no mention of it.
Schuzelt isn't alone in this. There are others in Hourne who ally with Leonis...
Do you speak the truth?
I needed to make an example o' th' woman to show those slugs who's boss.
B-but...
Traitors to their country are to be judged and damned. That's th' way, isn't it?
This should've guaranteed th' peace o' Hourne for now.
Something still troubling yer? Are yer not yet content?
King Muraga... Are you truly King Muraga?
Tell me, why're yer asking?
I-it's naught but...
The impression you left during our previous engagement... It was markedly different.
I am me. No one else can stand in my place.
And the battle?
Th' Goddess o' Victory showers her blessing over us. We are mighty.
What is Machérie's status...?
She's safe, o' course.
Where is she?
On this battlefield.
Unbelievable... What are those Leonis scoundrels plotting?
Nevertheless, Fennes will not yield. Their tails are already between their legs. No doubt they'll hole up in their castle.
If they succeed, it would be more than a nuisance...
It is decided, then. The pride of Hourne will play its part. «Solidus» shall join the fray.
Wretched Leonis... You shall be devoured, one and all!
